MARK 4.39 jah urreisands gasok winda jah qaþ du marein:
gaslawai,
afdumbn!
jah anasilaida sa winds jah warþ wis mikil.
MARK 4.40 jah qaþ du im:
duƕe faurhtai sijuþ swa?
ƕaiwa ni nauh habaiþ galaubein?
MARK 4.41 jah ohtedun sis agis mikil jah qeþun du sis misso:
ƕas þannu sa sijai, unte jah winds jah marei ufhausjand imma?
MARK 5.1 Jah qemun hindar marein in landa Gaddarene.
MARK 5.2 jah usgaggandin imma us skipa suns gamotida imma manna us aurahjom in ahmin unhrainjamma, MARK 5.3 saei bauain habaida in aurahjom:
jah ni naudibandjom eisarneinaim manna mahta ina gabindan.
MARK 5.4 unte is ufta eisarnam bi fotuns gabuganaim jah naudibandjom eisarneinaim gabundans was jah galausida af sis þos naudibandjos jah þo ana fotum eisarna gabrak, jah manna ni mahta ina gatamjan.
MARK 5.5 jah sinteino nahtam jah dagam in aurahjom jah in fairgunjam was hropjands jah bliggwands sik stainam.
MARK 5.6 gasaiƕands þan Iesu fairraþro rann jah inwait ina MARK 5.7 jah hropjands stibnai mikilai qaþ:
ƕa mis jah þus, Iesu, sunau gudis þis hauhistins?
biswara þuk bi guda,
ni balwjais mis!
MARK 5.8 unte qaþ imma:
usgagg, ahma unhrainja, us þamma mann!
MARK 5.9 jah frah ina:
ƕa namo þein?
jah qaþ du imma:
namo mein Laigaion, unte managai sijum.
MARK 5.10 jah baþ ina filu ei ni usdrebi im us landa.
MARK 5.11 wasuh þan jainar hairda sweine haldana at þamma fairgunja.
MARK 5.12 jah bedun ina allos þos unhulþons qiþandeins:
insandei unsis in þo sweina, ei in þo galeiþaima.
MARK 5.13 jah uslaubida im Iesus suns.
jah usgaggandans ahmans þai unhrainjans galiþun in þo sweina, jah rann so hairda and driuson in marein;
wesun-uþ-þan swe twos þusundjos, jah afƕapnodedun in marein.
MARK 5.14 jah þai haldandans þo sweina gaþlauhun jah gataihun in baurg jah in haimom, jah qemun saiƕan ƕa wesi þata waurþano.
MARK 5.15 jah atiddjedun du Iesua jah gasaiƕand þana wodan sitandan jah gawasidana jah fraþjandan þana saei habaida laigaion, jah ohtedun.
MARK 5.16 jah spillodedun im þaiei gaseƕun, ƕaiwa warþ bi þana wodan jah bi þo sweina.
MARK 5.17 jah dugunnun bidjan ina galeiþan hindar markos seinos.
MARK 5.18 jah inngaggandan ina in skip baþ ina, saei was wods, ei miþ imma wesi.
MARK 5.19 jah ni lailot ina, ak qaþ du imma:
gagg du garda þeinamma du þeinaim jah gateih im, ƕan filu þus frauja gatawida jah gaarmaida þuk.
MARK 5.20 jah galaiþ jah dugann merjan in Daikapaulein, ƕan filu gatawida imma Iesus;
jah allai sildaleikidedun.
MARK 5.21 jah usleiþandin Iesua in skipa aftra hindar marein, gaqemun sik manageins filu du imma, jah was faura marein.
MARK 5.22 jah sai, qimiþ ains þize swnagogafade namin Jaeirus;
jah saiƕands ina gadraus du fotum Iesuis MARK 5.23 jah baþ ina filu, qiþands þatei dauhtar meina aftumist habaiþ, ei
qimands lagjais ana þo handuns, ei ganisai jah libai.
MARK 5.24 jah galaiþ miþ imma, jah iddjedun afar imma manageins filu jah þraihun ina.

MARK 5.25 jah qinono suma wisandei in runa bloþis jera twalif MARK 5.26 jah manag gaþulandei fram managaim lekjam jah fraqimandei allamma seinamma jah ni waihtai botida, ak mais wairs habaida, MARK 5.27 gahausjandei bi Iesu, atgaggandei in managein aftana attaitok wastjai is.
MARK 5.28 unte qaþ þatei jabai wastjom is atteka, ganisa.
MARK 5.29 jah sunsaiw gaþaursnoda sa brunna bloþis izos, jah ufkunþa ana leika þatei gahailnoda af þamma slaha.
MARK 5.30 jah sunsaiw Iesus ufkunþa in sis silbin þo us sis maht usgaggandein;
gawandjands sik in managein qaþ:
ƕas mis taitok wastjom?
MARK 5.31 jah qeþun du imma siponjos is:
